name: EvoNoid - Bounce Balls Breaker
description:
Simple addictive endless game mode, swipe finger to aim paddle, shoot bouncing balls, break all bricks, try your best to break all bricks and get higher scores!

Revolution of a classic bouncing ball brick breaker, is funny and challenging.

√ Simple addictive bouncing ball paddle control
√ Endless game mode!
√ Free to play
√ Leaderboard supported
√ Play without WiFi
√ Tablet device supported

Features:
Download for free today, relax your brain, perfect time killer.
Challenge your friends with the best high scores in leader board.
Off-line (without internet connection) game supported
Easy to play, simplest game system, designed for one handheld play.
Playing in one handed. One finger controls.
